title: Kittie Knox: The Black Cyclist and Activist Who Challenged Race and Gender Barriers in the 1890s
content:
The improbable story of a young African American woman who stood up to 19th century cycling authorities.

Read the full article at Kittie Knox: The Black Cyclist and Activist Who Challenged Race and Gender Barriers in the 1890s on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
